question:
Which of the following countries has/have recently signed the Memorandum on accession to SCO (Shanghai Cooperation Organisation)?
  1. India
  2. Pakistan
  3. Uzbekistan
  4. Afghanistan
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: India and Pakistan have signed the memorandum of obligations on 24 June 2016 at Tashkent, thereby starting the formal process of joining the SCO as a full member.
